title: [NEW] Having issues Patching 5.13? Click Here!
body:
*Hey all,*

*Carrier has arriv-- ...errr...patch 5.13 has arrived!  If the patcher isn't appearing correctly, or is not patching normally, the steps here should get this resolved and back into the client!*

-----------------------------------------

> ***Launcher/Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!


> ***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body:
someone should probably mention the log in freeze that has come with this patch. many threads have been posted and nothing has been done about it. 
i myself have reinstalled, force shut down, and ran it as administrator. ive emailed riot and now im waiting for a response. HALP RITO ;3;

I have emailed them 3 times. Because it has happened to me 3 times. All in ranked games. They do not care right now about fixing it at all. Every email I got back they either blamed it on my connection or just talk about a different topic like leaver buster. It makes me mad that a game that i have put hundreds of dollars into simply cannot get the game right after 5 years.

I have been trying to download the new update. I restarted my computer twice. I even tried to reinstall the game. it wont update. I have 1196 MB, 0 kbps, and its stuck at 1%. I am very mad at this. I have been trying to fix this since noon. I just sits here. also, my brother downloaded illegal versions of five nights at freddys. I think this could by why LOL will not update. can someone help me? if not, fix this problem Riot.

That's exactly my problem too...reinstalled LoL for 5 times already, firewall and Antivirus down, resetted mt connection, eaven changed to a wired link instead of wireless, but still no progress...I am about to quit...
_**I main {{champion:429}} and sometimes when I press her Q it doesn't work **_
Because they updated her so that you can't use her Q when she is doing that jumpy thing
It's true. I've tried using it to kill enemies but it wont work.

My league will not patch either. It patches correctly until 32 percent, then it shows an unspecified error message. I've disabled windows firewall, turned peer to peer transfer on and off, and tried repairing. Is there a solution to this?

Hi, so whenever I login into my league account, my holy entire laptop will freeze. I mean my WHOLE laptop will freeze. Yesterday league was running fine and then _that_ happened. I've tried running the program as an administrator, changing my compatibility, and nothing is working. 

Patch 5.13  Windows 8.1
Thanks in advanced.

Hey SpyreLord!

Can you provide us with a [DxDiag log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)?

> [{quoted}](name=Elduris,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=fvv2REqj,comment-id=009b0000,timestamp=2015-07-18T07:35:23.297+0000)
>

> 
> Can you provide us with a [DxDiag log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)?

Going to bed won't respond for a while. Thanks for any help in the meantime :)

I have done everything this guide has said to do, and yet my patcher still insists on stopping at 33% and then just begins to continuously scan files to no end. This is really starting to give me a headache. I just want to play the damn game.

Hey A Drunken Pyrate,

Can you provide a patcher log for us to work off of?
http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/16?view=article
Here's another one in case that first isn't right.
Can you try resetting your Internet Explorer settings, and see if that works?
Would that be an issue? Because I don't use Internet Explorer.
I don't use it either; however, the client does, so the settings there affect the way the client interacts with everything else.
Oh, okay. How do I change the settings, then, and to what do I change them?

Try the solutions on this page: 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues
There doesn't seem to be anything on there about changing the settings in Internet Explorer. :(

Yeah, those are just some additional steps if you haven't tried them already. 

> Here's the link to changing your Internet Explorer settings. (Try the SSL steps as well as the reset if the SSL steps don't work).
From where are you quoting that, because I cannot find it, even when I try to do so with crtl+f?

I've had my fair share of awkward moments. This is one of them. T.T
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753044-Store-Error-Store-appears-blank-black-or-empty

Sorry about that.

So I'm trying that now, and it doesn't appear to be working. Something I noticed when trying to patch from the EU region is that the patcher appeared to be attempting to scan EVERY SINGLE FILE in the game folder instead of just the ones that needed to be updated.

Is it supposed to do this? If not, how do I make it stop?
Is there anyway there's a physical copy of the patch online that I can use to patch the game manually, or no? Because this is all just getting incredibly tiresome.
Wuks, How do we copy and paste the files you uploaded from your computer? :O

I had my client crash yesterday right as I was about to head into an ARAM match.  I attempted to repair the client, which repeatedly failed.  As such, I completely uninstalled LoL, including deleting the leftover files, then performed a registry clean with CClean.  I have attempted to reinstall the client, but I receive the Unspecified Error at various points of the process.  I went through all of the steps to disable my firewall and antivirus temporarily, and I seem to have gotten it to install past the 33% mark.  However, when it begins to "Apply Patches" at around 72%, this takes an extremely long time, and at 78% crashed to the "Unspecified Error."  Logs are attached:

Hey CourtJester03,

Can you try this: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues
it took what seemed like forever (I updated a laptop in half the time, and started the same time), but I finally got the patch to complete and it seems as if all is well.  Thank you for all the help!

Hey CourtJester03,

Great to hear! Did you try any of the solutions, or was it just the waiting game?

Hello, please help me to get this game to patch.

When I click the LoL shortcut, the LoL logo with a grey bar beneath it appears for a moment and then disappears.  Nothing further happens, and no LoL related processes show up in task manager.

I have tried running the admin .exe, running the normal .exe with admin privileges, all combinations of compatibility modes and screen resolutions.  I have tried the recommended fix of deleting various files in the install directory.
I resolved this issue by re-installing the game.
Great to hear!  :D  It does honestly seem like this was some type of corruption in the patcher itself.  The re-install seems to have fixed this up!

Hello in my passed games i played ranked and i was in my promos to silver and when i got into promos and i won three matches and lose 2 and I won series but it said i never did and i checked. league didn't record my match games and I don't know what to do now plz someone help me or tell me whats going on

I went ahead and took a look at your account.  It appears that since series started, you have gone 2-1!  The game you played just a while ago, gave you that 2nd victory.  You're almost there!!!!  Just one more win and you can enter the land of Silver! :D
Thx riot your the best! =D

Then I pressed launch and it froze my computer. When I opened LOL next, it came up with a message "unspecified error, check logs for info" and stays at "1 files scanned". I have tried the remedies explained in the riot-provided videos and none of them worked. Please help :)
